function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased spread of unverified COVID-19 information due to online information trust","Impact":"Heightened public confusion, misinformation, and potential risk exposure","Mitigation":"Promotion of critical thinking, fact-checking, and source verification","Technologies":"AI-powered fact-checking tools, online information verification platforms","People":"General public, social media users, internet users","Owner":"Government health agencies, social media platforms, education institutions"},{"Description":"Information overload leading to sharing of unverified COVID-19 information","Impact":"Heightened public confusion, misinformation, and potential risk exposure","Mitigation":"Promotion of critical thinking, fact-checking, and source verification","Technologies":"AI-powered fact-checking tools, online information verification platforms","People":"General public, social media users, internet users","Owner":"Government health agencies, social media platforms, education institutions"},{"Description":"Dependence on unverified online information for COVID-19 updates","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation and confusion among the public","Mitigation":"Promotion of critical thinking, fact-checking, and source verification","Technologies":"AI-powered fact-checking tools, online information verification platforms","People":"General public, social media users, internet users","Owner":"Government health agencies, social media platforms, education institutions"}]}
